thread.title: fragment design and Medicom Toy Team Up On These Incredible Carved Wooden Bearbricks
thread.title_full: fragment design and Medicom Toy Team Up On These Incredible Carved Wooden Bearbricks

author: David Fischer
title: fragment design and Medicom Toy Team Up On These Incredible Carved Wooden Bearbricks
text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
Medicom Toy once again worked with the craftsman of Karimoku and this time also brought Hiroshi Fujiwara and his fragment design team on board. Together the three partners present a new duo of 400% wooden Bearbricks. Different to the past executions in wood with Karimoku, these new fragment design versions look hand carved, with the result being rather impressive.
Priced at over $1,700 USD, the new Bearbricks launch in February and will for sure sell out fast.
